name: Wad World: WadSim
description:
WadSim is a game where you take the role of the dictator and have to take care of the Wads in your town. You do this by buying food, medicine and even building a military. If to many Wads die, you lose.

Please join my game jam: https://itch.io/jam/wad-world-lets-make-a-franchise-together
